item.description:
Originally a PBS 25 minute PBS tv episode from the late 1970s, “Fool’s Dance” explores the Shin Buddhist Myokonin's perspective of death and dying, and the meaning of Namu Amida Butsu. A comedy, this usual video will definitely leave with you a strong impression. Followed by a discussion.

See our main web site:

www.bffct.net
